item.title: 《傅雷家书》中对伴侣的理解
item.description: EUROPEAN CIVILISATION IS UNIQUE because it is the only civilisation which has imposed itself on the rest of the world.

item.title: The Shortest History of Europe
item.description: CHAPTER 1. Europe Classical and Medieval1 EUROPEAN CIVILISATION IS UNIQUE because it is the only civilisation which has imposed itself on the rest of the world.
